commit.message:
collect2.c (pexecute_pid): Rename to pid.

	* collect2.c (pexecute_pid): Rename to pid.
	(collect_wait, collect_execute, scan_prog_file, scan_libraries): Use
	pid.

From-SVN: r62269

files.patch:

+	* collect2.c (pexecute_pid): Rename to pid.
+	(collect_wait, collect_execute, scan_prog_file, scan_libraries): Use
+	pid.
